quest.name: The Penitent Man
journal: Landenel needs to explain a few things to you.

* This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Landenel at Camp Tranquil.

※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.
As Landenel feared, agaric flies have already taken notice of the brownie brushes. Having slain a swarm of the vilekin, collect a brownie brush as evidence.
You harvest a single succulent brownie brush. Deliver it to Landenel and tell him of the agaric fly infestation.
Landenel is unsurprisingly horrified to hear that you encountered agaric flies in the Lower Paths. All that remains is to inform his sentries...
objectives: * This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Landenel at Camp Tranquil.

dialogue.name: LANDENEL
dialogue.text: Let me be clear: this business between you, me, and the captain must remain a secret.

dialogue.name: LANDENEL
dialogue.text: See, I don't regret my time spent with the Company in the slightest. Traveling the world, meeting interesting people, killing them─it was all jolly good fun.

dialogue.name: LANDENEL
dialogue.text: Alas, Gridanians are, by and large, an unforgiving lot─Detoh here being a rare exception.

dialogue.name: LANDENEL
dialogue.text: I've had to go to great lengths to ensure that I am seen as a model citizen, with no taste for drinking, whoring, gambling, and all those other activities I so dearly miss.

dialogue.name: LANDENEL
dialogue.text: So understand that if you ruin my little charade by wagging your tongue, I'll fashion a noose with your entrails and hang you from the nearest heavenspillar.

dialogue.name: LANDENEL
dialogue.text: Now then, where were we...ah, yes, the egg. The first thing you must do is deal with the sentries patrolling the adamantoise breeding grounds. Poaching is illegal in Gridania, in case you were unaware.

dialogue.name: LANDENEL
dialogue.text: A shame we have so few Wailers to spare─especially with brownie brushes almost in season. Matron forfend if agaric flies claim the crop before we receive additional sentries...

dialogue.name: LANDENEL
dialogue.text: Aye, we will also soon need barrels of stingbrew to weaken and ward off the pests.

dialogue.name: LANDENEL
dialogue.text: But if any of the vilekin were found near the shrooms before we can take preventative measures, we would be forced to shift our patrols immediately...

dialogue.name: LANDENEL
dialogue.text: You will, of course, notify me if you encounter any agaric flies in the vicinity of the Lower Paths, yes?

dialogue.name: LANDENEL
dialogue.text: I pray this year's crop of brownie brushes comes late...

dialogue.name: LANDENEL
dialogue.text: Oh my, is this a brownie brush? And you say you slew a whole swarm of agaric flies!?

dialogue.name: LANDENEL
dialogue.text: Matron's teats, we cannot wait for reinforcements! We must do something!
